hyphenation.p: All end-of-line hyphenation has been removed: any remaining hyphenation occurred within the line

div.p: Nm. am Roman. Gelesen Lucian ― Lindau, Satiren; Hopfen, Hexenfang (für Jarno).―
Vm. mit Frau Haeberle-Speidel spazieren; Nm. Rich. Specht da (über Mahler).
